sentences.sContent: He swallowed the last of his coffee and asked for the bill.
sentences.sCn: 他喝完最后一口咖啡，要求结账。

sentences.sContent: Most snakes swallow their prey whole .
sentences.sCn: 大多数蛇都是把猎物囫囵吞下。

remMethod.val: s+wall(墙)+(l)ow → 燕子在墙角垒窝

trans.tranOther: to make food or drink go down your throat and towards your stomach
a small black and white bird that comes to northern countries in the summer
